article_title: Blue Cross to drop PPO plan covering 367,000 Texans
article_text:
Blue Cross to drop PPO plan covering 367,000 Texans

Photo: Associated Press File Photo Blue Cross Blue Shield of Texas is eliminating in 2016 its...

Health insurance carrier Blue Cross Blue Shield of Texas next year will eliminate a PPO health plan that 367,000 consumers statewide now depend on for health benefits.

og.description: The Blue Choice PPO product is being eliminated next year because the insurance company paid out $400 million more in claims than it collected in premiums in 2014.
